thread.title: Insurers' new business: 'active shooter' policies for schools

title: Insurers' new business: 'active shooter' policies for schools
text:
Insurers' new business: 'active shooter' policies for schools 3:18pm IST - 02:16 
The deadly school shootings in Sandy Hook, Connecticut and Parkland, Florida, among others, have prompted a growing number of education officials to purchase 'active shooter insurance' policies similar to those purchased by malls and movie theaters.   
The deadly school shootings in Sandy Hook, Connecticut and Parkland, Florida, among others, have prompted a growing number of education officials to purchase 'active shooter insurance' policies similar to those purchased by malls and movie theaters.  //reut.rs/2puh8AJ
